title: Katarina Permabans
body:
Anyone got anything to say on this?

I have to say if I play Kat I usually end up carrying and when I'm vs'ing one I will often opt for Riven mid just to shut her down as I don't like playing a lot of her Counters like Malz etc.

Does anyone think even after the recent nerf then second nerf she is stil overpowered?

replies.body:
She's not "over powered" I think the game right now there is no "clear" OP champs atm which is a rarity.

Katarina (like Le Blanc) is just one of those champions that snowballs insanely off 1 or 2 kills and if your team lacks CC its really hard to stop her. She's more of a headache to deal with then OP. Letting a Katarina through ban phase is like playing LoL on "I trust my team aren't idiots" mode, which isn't smart LOL

The top 4 bans worldwide are Zed, Le Blanc, Katarina and Sejuani with over 60% ban rates then it drops to like a 30% ban rate on the 5th most banned.
People just don't like playing against Assassins.
Kat sux if you aren't a dickhead. Also helps if you're a mid laner because you then don't have to rely on anyone lol.

Katarina stomps people who have no idea how to play the game, she will always be strong in low elo as long as her kit stays like it is, bronze people just ban her despite the fact 99% of the champion roster shits on her, if you use your brain, she's not a threat.

Assassins are getting gutted, Ghostcrawler works at Riot, what did you expect?
